About.Name: Isaac J. Fuchs
About.AboutText: Hello, I am Isaac Fuchs. I am a computer engineering student at Seattle Pacific University. I am focused on learning physical electronics and various python based coding languages.

Experience.EducationText: I recived my direct transfer agreement AA from Spokane Falls Community College (SFCC) in 2024 through running start. I focused on the general requirments at SFCC to prepare myself for full time college, as I had not yet decided on the exact degree I was going to work towards.
Experience.EmploymentText: I have worked a large varriety of jobs, from lifeguarding to being a caretaker at a child care center. From my past jobs I have learned to handle difficult schedules and conflicts with other employees. At my current job I am responcible for setting up the majority of exents.
Experience.SkillsText: Outside of employment related skills I play chess at a relativly high level, I am CPR certified, and I am an eagle scout.

Project1.Title: Drone with automatic stabalizing camera
Project1.Desc:
I was one of four team members who designed and built a FPV drone. We used a software called Betaflight to program it, and desgined a custom 3D printed chassis. The automaticly stabalizing camera was done through legacy features in Betaflight.

It has a GitHub repo and more details shown in screenshots.

Project2.Title: Mobile Electronic Construction Sign
Project2.Desc:
This is a description of Project Two.

It also has a GitHub repo and more details shown in screenshots.
